title: PBE website
body: So I got a pbe email saying that i can make an account but when I click the website it says its down when will it get fixed. please help I really want an account for PBE

replies.body: The PBE site is currently down for maintenance, so it's not possible to sign up or create an account right now.  Bookmark the [pbe status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates for now.  Hang tight!

Hey so I saw the status page and it says that the website is up and I click the link on my email account this is where it sends me https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed
Is it because the link I have is outdated or its the website that is still down?
the unranked guy dies 4 times in the first 4 mins of the game, how is this balanced?
why is this a thing? maybe dont let people que together if you cant garentee a fair match?
this makes zero sense, our jugnler who is unranked is auto feeding...

https://ru.op.gg/summoner/userName=McYarik

there is no reason 2 plats and an unranked are facing off ageist 3 diamonds in the same que. no excuse. do you think anyone wants to play game after game just to lose because they cant find anyone to play ageist.
i have lost 4 games in a row, becasue i a plat 5 and playing agiest challengers, with sub par teamamtes, how many games should i lose to premades untill this is balanced?
